name: UpsertHubspotUsers
description:
Create or update user records in HubSpot CRM.

This tool is used to create or update user records in HubSpot CRM by specifying a unique property value through the `idProperty` query parameter. It is helpful for maintaining and synchronizing user data in HubSpot.

parameters.name: user_records_data
parameters.description: A JSON array of user objects to be upserted. Each object must include `idProperty`, `objectWriteTraceId`, `id`, and `properties` to define unique user records and their attributes.

idProperty.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

objectWriteTraceId.description: An identifier for tracing the creation request.

id.description: The unique ID of the object.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.
